channel.title: Missing texture in RP loading screen
channel.description: When my loading screen for RP came up, it looked fine. Then the "loading..." sign flickered, and I got the pink and black rectangles. I have the official torrent version, any ideas? EDIT: sorry for not placing in bug reporting

item.title: Missing texture in RP loading screen
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
It’s missing from the installer, so that wont help. The 4 : 3 background RP is fixed in further releases though.

Read full topic
